arabic_text: أَثُمَّ إِذَا مَا وَقَعَ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦٓۚ ءَآلۡـَٰٔنَ وَقَدۡ كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
translation: Will you believe in it only after it befalls you[44]? Now! While you used to seek its hastening[45]?”
footnotes: [44] i.e., it is too late to benefit from belief. [45] Challenging those who sought to bring it immediately.
